sentence: She is going to have dinner with us tonight.
I am going to meet my friends tomorrow.
We are going to go to Africa next month.
I am going to live in the UK next year.
My brother is going to buy new shoes.
I think you are going to be a great journalist.
He is going to take photos of our family.
I am going to buy some bananas for breakfast.
We are going to take a turtle next week.
She is going to cook burgers tomorrow.
My family is going to visit Europe this summer.
I am going to go to the pet shop.
I am going to buy some candles for my living room.
We are going to have a barbecue tomorrow.
My sister is going to study Chemistry at the university.
I am going to play golf with my friend tonight.
I am going to the rock concert with my friends tonight.
I am going to slice some cheese for the sandwich.
We are going to go to the theatre this weekend.
He is going to study English in the library.
I am going to listen to my favourite songs.
She is going to learn to play the guitar.
We are going to stay at this hotel for two nights.
They are going to wait for us at the cafe.
